description:
TRINITY

A game that contains great story, satisfying atmosphere, extreme feelings, carefully designed puzzles and more! You are in your own... TRINITY!

T- "Here..."
H - "Enough whimpering!"
...
T-" What's going on? That is enough!"
H - "Shut up! You make us look weak as always."
...
M - *trembling* "It is so dark and scary..." 
H - "If you do not stop speaking I will send you to world of suffers!"
...
T - "But.. for what?"
Z - "It was all for you. All for serenity."

...

Inputs:

After first event use 'SHIFT' to Dash

After second event use 'E' to Hook

After third event use 'Q' to use Telekinesis

Well... Use your TRINITY Powers wisely!

H - "Have lots of fun!"

M - "Be safe..."

Z - "and always stay calm."

Designed and developed for "UDO Next Jam #1" game jam in August 2021
